headline: Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG) Valuation Check As Expansion And Digital Growth Renew Investor Confidence
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG) has been back in focus after management outlined plans to keep expanding its restaurant base, push further into international markets, and lean into Chipotlanes and digital ordering. See our latest analysis for Chipotle Mexican Grill. Against this backdrop, the share price has a 1 day return of 4.41% and a 30 day share price return of 7.38%. The year to date share price return of 8.62% contrasts with a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 27.16%, suggesting...
